content: another really fast crochet project to work up the lady bug is about 3 5 inches long and 2 5-3 inches tall when complete not including her antennae made of worsted weight yarn with safety eyes and felt patches on her back i ve put my crafting pattern notes on my blog at heliina livejournal com 1 **please note that this project contains small parts that are not suitable for children it s not meant as a toy for babies or small children ** 1 heliina livejournal com
